summary: This is a service request form from the Federal Bureau of Prisons for technical support to install and configure new Vicon V942D cameras into a NICE Vision surveillance system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The request indicates an emergency need for phone support to troubleshoot network and programming issues.

events.title: Service request for camera installation at MCC New York
events.description: A service request is created for phone support to assist in network troubleshooting and programming to add new Vicon V942D cameras into the NICE Vision system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center), NEW YORK, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a service request form related to the Federal Bureau of Prisons' Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The request is for technical support to install and configure new Vicon V942D cameras into a NICE Vision surveillance system.
The request is marked as an emergency and is scheduled for September 20, 2019.
The problem described is the inability to add cameras to the NICE Vision system via Sitebuilder with ONVIF, despite the cameras being pingable.
The document reference EFTA00125620 appears to be part of a larger set of records, with a related detail item EFTA00125621.
